short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zen TimeZone Converter is a simple and efficient Chrome extension that helps you instantly convert time across different time zones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're scheduling meetings, coordinating with teams across the globe, or planning travel, this tool saves you time and effort.

Features:
- Quickly convert any time zone to your local time.
- Intuitive interface for fast time zone selection.
- Supports all major time zones around the world.
- Lightweight and easy to use, directly from your browser toolbar.
- No sign-up required, just install and use!
- Perfect for remote workers, global teams, or anyone needing fast time zone conversions.
